title: Netflix: The One With the Wavering Subscribers
text:
The latest script from Netflix was critically acclaimed. Or perhaps it just appeased skeptical reviewers. Even before the new wave of competitors enter the streaming race, the front-runner may be tripping over its own feet.

Third-quarter results Wednesday afternoon sparked a 9% jump for Netflix’s shares after hours. Earnings for the period exceeded expectations and the results contrasted sharply with the last report three months ago when Netflix reported a drop in U.S. subscribers for the first time in nearly a decade.

...
description: Shares jump as subscriber growth returns, but the competitive threat is real.
